string-array.name: exact
string-array.item: At least you got something right!
How does it feel standing on the fence?
You just about made it! Tempted to bunk? Sorry, you can’t.
This is nothing to be proud of. You just got lucky.
This ain’t your GPA. Stop gloating.
Stop smiling. You just about made it.

string-array.name: more
string-array.item: You REALLY need do other things in life!
You seem be to be pretty jobless.
God. Save us from this nerd.
Do you have any other life goals?
Classroom lover. Life Hater!
Do you have nowhere else to go?
Why? Why would you do this?
Maybe you can transfer you extra attendance to someone else?
Since you are always in class, how about some proxies for others?
Look around. You have nothing to do.

string-array.name: low
string-array.item: You still have time to make up. Or Not.
Do you still have hopes?
The Eternal Optimist
It’s never too late to start. Or maybe it is.
Close enough. But still not good enough.

string-array.name: drastic
string-array.item: Your time here is done. You may leave now.
Sorry. There is no light at the end of the tunnel for you.
You sad, sad, little person. Rise up and start over.
The juniors are here! Say hello! :)
Whoa! Those numbers are low. Really, really low.
May God… no, sorry, even God can’t help you.
It’s time to bring out the wallet ;)

string-array.name: smart
string-array.item: Liar, Liar! Pants on fire!
Really? You think you are that clever? Or we’re that dumb?
If only you used your extra smart brain in actual classes.
Wow! Genius. You are a class apart!
The world needs more people like you.

string-array.name: incomplete
string-array.item: You make me feel incomplete. Enter all fields.
You make me feel stupid. Enter all fields.
You make me feel hopeless. Enter all fields.
You are not smart. Please enter all fields.

string-array.name: dumb
string-array.item: Like, seriously? What is the matter with you?
No, can\'t do. Sorry.
The world could do without you.
How on Earth are we supposed to calculate that?
Aaaaaargh! That doesn\'t make any sense! You make no sense!
This is your last chance. Wake up that brain of yours.
Now, that\'s an all-time low level of dumbness.
